lead_paragraph: Amid signs that the investigation is slowing down, they issued a public appeal for help from anyone who might have information on an 18-minute window before the couple were killed in a shootout with the police.

headline.print_headline: Help Sought on 18-Minute Gap in California Killers’ Timeline
headline.main: Help Sought to Close 18-Minute Gap in San Bernardino Inquiry

snippet: Amid signs that the investigation is slowing down, they issued a public appeal for help from anyone who might have information on an 18-minute window before the couple were killed in a shootout with the police.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation says it has accounted for almost all four hours between time terrorist couple Syed Rizwan Farook and Tashfeen Malik killed 14 people in San Bernardino, Calif, and time they died in police shootout, except for 18-minute window; asks public for help on figuring out gap, hoping to identify residences or businesses couple might have had dealings with in that time.
